name: Karate Chop
description: You extend a hand towards a target creature for a savage karate chop. Make a melee attack roll, doing 1d8 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. Karate Chop scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
